channel.title: Comments on: It may not be much, but today I realized that I’m getting close to 2000 trophies. Not bad for a casual gamer.

item.title: By: DaveSimonH
item.dc:creator: DaveSimonH
item.description:
I have just over 1700 trophies (level 250), over PS3 & PS4. Also 11 platinums:
* Death Stranding * Dragon Quest Builders 2 * Horizon Zero Dawn * inFamous 2 (PS3) * Mass Effect * Mass Effect 2 * No Man's Sky * Saints Row 3 (PS3) * Skyrim * Skyrim (PS3) * Spider-Man
For me platinums are just an excuse to keep playing a game after the main story. I think most of the above list were pretty straightforward, but there was a 'Dragon Quest Builders 2' trophy for dog breeding that was pain. Not difficult, just annoying.
I took a break from 'Mass Effect 3', but I'll probably try and get its platinum to wrap up the Trilogy.
item.content:encoded:
I have just over 1700 trophies (level 250), over PS3 & PS4. Also 11 platinums:

* Death Stranding
* Dragon Quest Builders 2
* Horizon Zero Dawn
* inFamous 2 (PS3)
* Mass Effect
* Mass Effect 2
* No Man’s Sky
* Saints Row 3 (PS3)
* Skyrim
* Skyrim (PS3)
* Spider-Man

For me platinums are just an excuse to keep playing a game after the main story. I think most of the above list were pretty straightforward, but there was a ‘Dragon Quest Builders 2’ trophy for dog breeding that was pain. Not difficult, just annoying.

I took a break from ‘Mass Effect 3’, but I’ll probably try and get its platinum to wrap up the Trilogy.

item.title: By: Khenic
item.dc:creator: Khenic
item.description:
I'm a casual gamer and I've had the PS4 since the preorder. Picked up the PS4 Pro and now have the PS5, so now 3 systems.
Still. not. a. single. Platinum...
item.content:encoded:
I’m a casual gamer and I’ve had the PS4 since the preorder. Picked up the PS4 Pro and now have the PS5, so now 3 systems.

Still. not. a. single. Platinum…

item.title: By: MARS_LFDY
item.dc:creator: MARS_LFDY
item.description: Would not call level 257 casual at all.
item.content:encoded: Would not call level 257 casual at all.

item.title: By: SubspaceBiographies
item.dc:creator: SubspaceBiographies
item.description: Damn, I’m level 303 with just over 3000 trophies. I haven’t looked at that in awhile. I did just platinum Ghost of Tsushima which brings me to a total of 6 platinums since PS3. Seems kind of sad when I think about it that way lol EDIT: I just realized my platinums on Control, Odyssey, and Ghost of Tsushima are all since my kids were born just over a year ago. I guess even though my time is more limited it’s more focused now. I don’t want to jump to new games till I’ve exhausted what I’m playing bc I know I’ll never get back to it lol
item.content:encoded:
Damn, I’m level 303 with just over 3000 trophies. I haven’t looked at that in awhile. I did just platinum Ghost of Tsushima which brings me to a total of 6 platinums since PS3. Seems kind of sad when I think about it that way lol
EDIT: I just realized my platinums on Control, Odyssey, and Ghost of Tsushima are all since my kids were born just over a year ago. I guess even though my time is more limited it’s more focused now. I don’t want to jump to new games till I’ve exhausted what I’m playing bc I know I’ll never get back to it lol

item.content:encoded: So which games where worthy of you getting the plat?
